ltscp 1
ltscp Copies labeled transition systems
ltscp -bfs -sort -postsort -segments N input.ext1
output.ext2
&ext1; &ext2;
Description
Copies a labeled transition system from input.ext1 to output.ext2. The format of output is determined by the extension of the file name. Allowed extensions are: &ext3;
Options
-bfs
Reorder the lts into bfs exploration order
-sort
Sort the transitions per state
-postsort
Sort the transitions per state before writing
-segments N
Write output in .dir format with N segments. Has no influence if output is not in .dir format.
&ltscp.xml;
